name: Repay
description:
Repay is a two players cooperative game. You play as unscrupulous space mechanics in charge of repairing space ships from all the galaxy, who do not hesitate to change parts that didn't need it, behind customer's back to make more money..!


• Flavien Rombouts (Flavs) :  U.I. designer, level designer, tech artist 
https://www.artstation.com/flavien

• Emilien Massemin (haikokurai) : 3D artist, level artist, sound designer
https://www.artstation.com/emilien

• Valentin Boyaval (Cromach) : character artist,  game developper  
https://www.artstation.com/cromach

• Valentin Liebaert (Hozo) : 3D artist, level artist, tech artist

https://www.artstation.com/liebaert

• Quentin Eudeline (Synadiome): game developper

Tools : 3ds Max, Unity, Substance Painter,  Photoshop

Made in 48hs during Global Game Jam #2020 ("Repair")
